channel.title: CVE Feed for yoast -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yoast -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28785|2023-05-28T18:47:17.763Z -- yoast -- yoast%20seo%3A%20local
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Yoast Yoast SEO: Local plugin <= 14.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-28780|2023-11-18T22:45:05.817Z -- yoast -- yoast%20local%20premium
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Yoast Yoast Local Premium.This issue affects Yoast Local Premium: from n/a through 14.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-28775|2024-06-11T13:35:23.779Z -- yoast -- yoast%20seo%20premium
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Yoast Yoast SEO Premium.This issue affects Yoast SEO Premium: from n/a through 20.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-32300|2023-08-23T14:12:36.529Z -- yoast -- yoast%20seo%3A%20local
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Yoast Yoast SEO: Local plugin <= 14.8 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4041|2024-06-04T17:55:47.879Z -- yoast -- yoast%20seo
item.description: The Yoast SEO plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via URLs in all versions up to, and including, 22.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-4984|2024-06-04T17:54:33.970Z -- yoast -- yoast%20seo
item.description: The Yoast SEO plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘display_name’ author meta in all versions up to, and including, 22.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
